verses.roman:
ātatatvāc ca mātṛtvād
ātmā hi paramo hariḥ

synonyms: ātatatvāt—due to being all-pervading; ca—and; mātṛtvāt—due to being the progenitor; ātmā—the soul; hi—certainly; paramaḥ—supreme; hariḥ—the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
translation: " 'Hari, the Personality of Godhead, is the all-pervasive original source of everything; He is therefore the Supersoul of everything.'

purport.content: This is a quotation from the Bhāvārtha-dīpikā, Śrīdhara Svāmī's commentary on Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam.
